name: Refs - I Should Be Alone Right Now (ft. Kevin Garrett)

attributes.trait_type: I Should Be Alone Right Now (ft. Kevin Garrett)

metadata.description:
In April of 2020, separated by an ocean and 3000 miles, both of us went into self-isolation. Physically, of course -- like everyone else. But also musically.

Turning inwards, we scoured the Refs instrumental vault for our most menacing, introverted and brooding soundscapes -- and proceeded to write 12 songs in 12 days. 2 years later, we offer up our debut album, "New Religion".			

Our song "I Should Be Alone Right Now" featuring our friend Kevin Garrett mirrors the calm-before-the-storm state of the world circa April 2020. In some ways, it holds even more water now, in light of ever-present systemic and cultural decline.		

The animated image we chose for artwork is a taste of an unreleased "New-Religion" themed collectable project. Owners of "I Should Be Alone Right Now" NFTs will get a sneak peak of what's to come.

-Dessauer and Rich

lyrics.text:
I watch you let it all out 
Really ripping me a new one
						
Well I’m glad you let it out now
And not when it’s too late for me to run
						
I should be alone right now 
Better if I shut my mouth
Need a little time to figure it out
						
I should be alone right now 
Conversation’s going south 
Need a little time to figure it out
		
I tip toe around your ego
Not because I am afraid of you
						
I do this because I know
it’s the surest path away from you
						
I should be alone right now 
Better if I shut my mouth
Need a little time to figure it out
						
I should be alone right now 
Conversation’s going south 
Need a little time to figure it out
						
one too many times I’ve had the feeling you don’t like seeing me win
your mother never taught you how to share
						
one too many times I’ve had the feeling that you’re my fakest friend
your mother never taught you how to share
						
I watched you walk around me
While I was picking up the pieces
And you can’t make up your mind about me 
Thinking you were something I needed 
When really I
						
I should be alone right now
Cause you don’t need to know right now 
About every little moment
There’s a reason I keep hoping
						
I should be alone right now
God I wish I shut my mouth
Instead of leaving the door open
I just need to let it go damn I should be		
						
I should be alone right now
Better if I shut my mouth
Need a little time to figure it out
						
I should be alone right now
Conversation’s going south 
Need a little time to figure it out
